values: All fic will be posted/linked to and at My AO3 from this point forward.

1) Make a list of fifteen characters first, and keep it to yourself for the moment. (That way you're not leading the questions asked to fit the characters.)

2) Ask your flist to post questions in the comments.

For example:

'One, Nine and Fifteen move in together. Is this a really bad idea?'
'Under what circumstances might Five and Seven fall in love?'
'Which character on the list would you most want on your side in a zombie invasion?'

3) After your flist has asked enough questions, round them up and answer them using the fifteen characters you selected beforehand, then post them.

-

what the hell, it is friday: Gratuitous Sim Post Time! This post brough to you by hugs: Hugs! Also Joshua3 who likes his toys: Okay so THINGS, first I sent Chris and One out on a proper date In the middle of the crowd behind them is a sim going into labor. One helped her get to the hospital after she finished eating, which gave her a baby moodlet like you get when you give birth: Go figure. But yay for good neighbor points I suppose. They then proceeded to makeout until 3 am or so out on the street. Go Pikes! Onto hobbies, everyone seems to want MOAR SKILLS lately. Moira has taken to fishing. One has taken up gardening. And Chris is learning how to rock out. In other news family dinners are stupidly difficult with them, this is as close as I got. In bigger news Chris would like another child. ...and I am weak and promised it. But not for awhile. Emily needs to be close to move out and Josh needs to be a child and alkfjldakfjsdlkfj but BABY. (it will be a boy) AND MO WANTS TO BE AN ASTRONAUT ASLKDJASLDKAJS LOVE. So canon Burglars are really annoying. Chris never actually made is downstairs and Mo said 'eff this' and kept going back to sleep but Emily and One waited downstairs in their pajamas for justice to be served. One also made this awesome face during it. Moira and Gaila are becoming friends! (Those are Gaila's parents behind them) there was adorable tag playing. they are going to end up together I DECREE IT I love when sims talk while carrying babies/toddlers. Mo dreams of cute shoes. So she didn't pick up Mom's fashion sense then. Emily clearly wants to party. Oh teen sims. And I love when Chris & One's dreams are complementary <3 Sister bonding over their dislike of hw. And grumpy!Emily. Because she does that. I NEED TO FIND HER A DATE. And now the gratuitous Pike/One section: awww Besides the million times of woohoo I've discovered they can makeout on the bed which is strange and pervy and I love it. there is just no wrong here. THE END

Oh well. Life isn't that interesting (though Date was fail for anyone following that). To start: Backtracking to Joshua! Because I seem to have completely forgotten about him last time. So when One went into labor she was out around town (she had been getting a massage at the spa) Phil was nearby and flailed: Then One walked herself to the hospital since it was only a block away. Oh One. Pike met her there, baby was had and little Joshua3 was born and they took him home. I think this was the first birth that Pike actually made it to on time. Third time's the charm. I got 2 trait picks so he is Brave and Easily Impressed. awww what an adorable bb. You can tell it's a boy because the blanket is blue this time. Oh sims. So yeah, cute baby raising abounded. I love this cap they just both seem so confused. Around this point was their *first* move which was response to my game glitching up a storm. Hence confusion and forgetting to post last time because I was so annoyed at it. At the new house being adorable. Also Mo like to think about herself a lot. I don't know what this says about my sims. Okay now the recent batch of things, newest house, and namely EVERYONE GOT AGED UP YAY! First it was Emily's turn... This was her auto look... And here she is after some styling. She is mostly a Chris clone. Oh man. Helping with her siblings... Asserting her independence by rocking out in the park. I haven't found a good potential boy or Girl friend yet but I am working on it I promise. And then I aged up bbJosh because holy hell newborns take too much effort. Check out that little stunner. His hair is technically gray (because Pike had some grey at time of conception) so I darkened it slightly but otherwise this is exactly how he popped out and since he's got a little Jeffrey Hunter going on I'm pretty gleeful. And the only Child to get Number One's eyes, lucky guy. Phil was over to play One in chess(She is very close to her goal of being the top ranked chess player!) and he stayed to play with the kids awhile. And then this happened which just made me giggle. He can talk and go to the bathroom by himself, walking is being worked on. Synchronized bedtime! So then it was Moira's turn to have a birthday: Auto -> Final Also she gets a dinosaur sweater for max gradeschool coolness point. She had Nyota come over and they did hw like good children. Chris is reading a romance novel called 'Commitment Issues'. I'm not even surprised... Awww Now that the children can mostly take care of themselves One is catching up on her reading. In her Underwear. Like a bamf. And here's some gratuitous scantily clad Pike because the new update allows to give the guys body hair! So he totally got some. For accuracy. For references since I am now far too intrigued by trying to figure out how each of the children will grow up feature wise. For the record Pike's eyes are gray, One's are blue (obvs), Emily's are hazel/light brown, Moira's are PURPLE and Josh has his mom's blue. idek how Emily & Mo's eyes happened. Sim genetics, man. Also I am kicking myself for not getting a good face pic of Emily as a toddler. In closing:

SO HAVE A SIMS POST INSTEAD. (all hi excuse to use MY NEW PONY ICON LOOKIT HOW CUTE APPLEBLOOM IS) [note: not made by me] ((I should really make a sims icon)) If you're on tumblr you've seen most of this. I'm sure it's a terrible burden to look at adorable sims so much. So Moira grew up into a toddler: She takes after Mom. But still loves Dad too. and is generally REALLY ADORABLE My favorite part is now Emily can PLAY with her little sister ALSO HUG. HUUUUUUGS. playing with toys.... MOIRA PLAYS WITH A PONY. GOOD MOIRA. ANYWAY, Moira can now talk, walk and go to the potty all by herself so now it's time to start trying for bb #3! So, the parents Pike called in a babysitter for their two current bundles of joy and went on a date. They toured the Military base and tried to be sneaky and try for a baby in the armoury. They were not so sneaky: Ooops! But they survived the embarrassment to continue making out. After returning home.... First sign of pregnancy! ACHIEVED So of course they celebrated with more woohoo Poor One was sick shortly after the woohoo. But it is okay because I'll send her to the spa soon and let her get pampered and happy for the pregnancy. Also Pike will give her lots of massages because he likes to do that. Oh and I made a My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic file. Because I have no self control: Applejack and Apple bloom having pizza after their first night in town. As Applejack extolls the virtues of gardening of course. I have Fluttershy, Rarity and Sweetie Belle made so far, once I'm done I think I'll move them all into one of the giant houses and have a giant redercorating party and go from there.

No really. There is absolutely nothing of real weight in this post just lots of pictures of my sims being silly and getting married. To start off Pike is now Mayor, which means he gets a nifty new uniform for work: The sash kills me every time. Pike and One's relationship has progressed quickly and amusingly. Cait and Phil have been pretty cute too and occasionally hilarious pervy: Unfortunately their schedules line up terribly so they're very slow going. I tried a proposal and it failed because I hadn't established the relationship enough. But here's a pic let's pretend she said yes. Ok? Ok! Back to the Pike and One side of things: They cannot be detoured, even by Phil trying to clean their room. They won out in the end. They did this on their own I take no responsiblity. so after some dating Pike proposed (so their names change how I want without me having to go to city hall, One actually wished for it first) ((LENSFLARE RING)) So they keep up with the cute and I split the house so Cait and Phil went go live across the street, thus making my game SO MUCH SIMPLER. I'm hoping they get married soon too. Fingers crossed. Anyway, night before the wedding: awww. Running out the door being late for their own wedding: But they made it and were adorable on the beach And now they're married! and everyone coos over One. Who had to run to work an hour later but OH WELL, it was then or wait like 4 game days (their schedules are odd). LATER. So I hadn't actually managed to get either couple to woohoo so Pike & One got to woohoo on their wedding night for the first time. I find the lead up hilarious so here: FINALLY. Next up redesigning the house and BABIES. I also finally made a me!sim in a side game: she paints and writes a lot. SURPRISE.

In my sims game Pike and One are ~dating~ now. Time to split the houshold impending (I refuse to split until I get Cait and Boyce to woohoo)... Then I can build a magical ranch house <strike>in the middle of suburbia</strike> and Pike&One can have babies on it. Yes. 

In other news it is friday therefore I am having pizza and watching horror movies while my roommate goes to the Opera. yep.

mlia

*waits anxiously for other shiplympics teams to post. I WANNA SEEEEEEE THE PRETTY*

So I bought This because I had a gift of amazon money. Mainly because it has the Early Voyages issues i.e. PIKE COMICS YAY plus 6 BAZILLION OTHERS OMG. At less than half the prices of the omnibus that has EV I could not resist, even though they're digital. So I'm only on issue 2 of 17 and so far.... Firstly, Pike is badass and I love him: Number One is also badass (Pike has just been stolen by ~aliens, this is seemingly her first time in the chair): Also they share a brain and I love it, plus awkward!One: Okay so this is Cusack, Pike's (doomed) yeoman, who is a bit pervy, so therefore I cannot read that 'Eh?' as anything other than implying Pike and One are a bit ~close. I may have to post some bits to or something if it keeps up. Pretty much everytime they share a panel I end up squeeing. JUST UGH SO MUCH LOVE. EDIT: AND NOW A BUXOM BLONDE ON RIGEL IS OBVIOUSLY FLIRTING WITH HIM AND ALL HE HAS TO SAY IS 'Uhh'. SO. BAD. AT. GIRLS. &hearts

Sickness hit me like a brick today. Partly because I COULD NOT SLEEP last night because I was too busy coughing. Canceled going out of town this weekend. I don't want to infect people and/or get even worse. 

I thought I was feeling better but then realized I dragged myself to the living room an hour early (I want to watch Big Bang Theory) while completely oblivious. idek. Now I'm camped out on the couch instead and moving back to my bed for 40 minutes takes too much effort. 

I think it's Sims time instead! Fingers crossed for not ruining their sim lives.

You have been warned. There is nothing of worth her besides dopey caps of Trek Sims. Here's Pike reading. He does that a lot. His goal is the become LEADER OF THE FREE WORLD. Right now he's a yes man at town hall. He's trying. Cait and Phil. They are dating and sort of hilarious. Cait fixes things, fishes, and dances a lot. Phil CLEANS ALL THE THINGS. And reads. They're schedules don't match up very well but I'm sending them on a date next sim night because it's Cait's day off and Phil wants to go to the symphony. This is an average night at the Yorktown house. Number One has a tendency to start exercising right in front of wherever Pike is sitting. He's usually oblivious. Cait is dancing though it's hard to tell here. Phil is sleeping in the background because he is grumpy and does that. My accomplishment of the day. They are friends right now and I'm working them up to dating. It is slow going. Number One's thoughts immediately after showering. I call this a win. I was clued into the code to get lots of money today so the house now functions much better and there is room and things (THANK GOD). Next on the list is a second bathroom. They also live next the Kirks who are married and I am hoping pop out a little sim baby soon. *plot plot plot*

Got linked to this today: http://www.pocketkittys.com/welcome.html

Basically: An adult silver persian cat (Cuddy) was adopted and now the owner can't take care of him. Cuddy's in Iowa rn and the breeder is in southern california. The breeder's looking for someone adopt him or to help her get the cat up to the minneapolis airport to send him back to them so he doesn't have to go to a shelter. 

I don't really have the means to drive all the way there and back with a cat on my own but could help get him to the airport  to send if anyone can actually get him within an hour or so of the cities if he doesn't find a home. 

Pass it around, etc.

Still slightly sluggish from my Terrible Sleep Schedule but, this is a good things! post instead. Take that life. my dad found a new anteanna for my tv and it works! I have channels! That aren't fuzzy! I can watch Glee on time! I haven't had a channel receiving tv since I went to college due to the dorm setup, minneapolis' broadcasting tech and that I am far too cheap for cable when 90% of anything I want will show up on hulu a day later. Whenever I visit home I tend to spend a day in a blanket on the couch watching tv right away. I don't *really* miss it (otherwise I would have caved for cable long ago) but it's sort of terribly exciting to be able to get tv again. I'm pretty energized despite complete ruin of my sleep patterns, I reorganized the kitchen on monday and am tackling my room next (hopefully with large pile of things to toss in the trash/sell) because I always come back from the holidays with too much stuff. I've got some dolls I've been meaning to sell anyway. Also popping out fan things like a fiend. (Though not the apocabigbang because I am useless like that) I have a full rough of a Jasper/Alice vid that appeared in the last 48 hours and no one's allowed to shun me for that. also getting addicted to the Dear Girls Above Me guy. I have sea creature silly ringz and there are little pink octopi. Cannot resist tentacle jokes. OH! Also I finally figured out which song a particular riff that always gets stunk in my head is from! (Time to Pretend by MGMT) It's literally been reoccurring for a good 2 years. I'm not even surprised it's a hipster song. It was pure luck, someone recced a playlist that had it. It came on and I was like WAIT WAIT THIS IS IT! It was exciting. I might make cupcakes tonight. I think I've recovered from holiday sweets overload. We shall see. Maybe friday instead.

Staring at my <lj user="schmoop_bingo"> card and telling it to write itself. For some reason it's not working....

1. Comment on this and I will give you 3 fictional fandom characters. (feel free to specify/request gender)
2. Decide of the 3 whom you would marry, do, and/or dump.
3. Post this meme to your journal with your answers (pictures are optional).

Marry:
Topher Brink

Okay this was the hard one. The whole bunch are highly flawed characters, which could I actually handle marrying is a bit of a tossup. He's seemingly edging on amoral but he does not have the same reckless hero thing as the other two plus considering his end it's clear he's not completely incapable of emotion and morality. Also he's adorable and I like geeks. So Topher wins! 

Do:
Wolverine/Logan

Like you wouldn't. That is a chance I would not turn down.

Dump: 
Sirius Black

I love you Sirius, but your heart belongs to Remus. Plus you kicked it at like 35 and all your friends die.

and another meme going around:

<i> If you were asked to pick one scene, one shot, one detail, one moment of some kind out of all the things I've made and say "This, this, for whatever reason, I remember, this is something that struck home with me, that I wanted to keep," what would it be?

Debated the existence of Chris Pine's mole. (Right side of face, near his earlobe)

It's missing in a scene or two of Trek but yes, indeed it does exist and was not removed because he has it in Unstoppable.

Yes, you needed to know this.

Hokay, so here's the earth I have been ~thinking about nanowrimo. Was intending to skip. Figured I'd rather use it to work on blacking out my card, shorter requirements, it's highly self indulgent and happy making etc. Still doing that. Though I'll be doing a 'finish a prompt every 2 days' and go into december. Easy (also have to keep reminding self that dude, I art and vid and graphic and making myself write for them all is just cruel. I can pop out an icon set in an hour. So yeah) Here's where I am getting tricky. So instead of actual nanowrimo I'm going to do an art version. I've been wanting to expand/redo This comic for awhile. I'm going to. I'm going to nose to the grindstone and produce a fuller and longer version that I could potentially (hopefully) actually shop around to publishers. I'm going to figure out a schedule and there will be a lot of planning involved but damnit I have the time and if I ever want it done I have to do it now. The only question left is if I go straight and just keep working on the little mermaid or if I use a different story. I'm rather tempted by doing sleeping beauty ngl. Possible both? Make a set type thing (That would take much longer, but still) In conclusion: I am crazypants I have an addiction to fairytales I am going to produce more art in a month than possible every before in my life (... actually I might not. But shhh, it'll be intense) also I'm signing up to write for as soon as I settle on fandom. And have already signed up to do art or mix. When it rains it pours. Or something like that.....

I have made a mess of my sleep schedule again which is unfortunate. My life is not that exciting. Tomorrow I fix up my star trek dress.

Day 30 - Your favorite song at this time last year
